name: Jazira
description:
Hey all, this is a rough prototype of a first person survival game that I was working on for about a few days. The game does have some bugs with collisions on enemies with the axe. Hope you guys enjoy and please leave some feedback.

Game Controls

  • W,S,A,D (Key) = Movement.
  • Left mouse click = Attack.
  • E (Key) = Pick up item.
